alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 6:40PM CDT until May 31 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... South central Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 639 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roll, moving northeast at 50 mph. Golf ball sized hail was reported in Reydon. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vici, Camargo, Sharon, Mutual, Crawford, Roll and Cestos. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
